project.description: This job loads the UniProt data into the database. It will only load the data if there is a new release (as captured by UniProt-Release-Check_d).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_RELEASE_1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID of the stored release to compare. Leave blank and output will give the options

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_RELEASE_2
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID of the second stored release to compare. Leave blank and output will give the options

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "WORKSPACE=$WORKSPACE" echo "DB_RELEASE_1=$DB_RELEASE_1" echo "DB_RELEASE_2=$DB_RELEASE_2" cd $SOURCEROOT export KEEP_TEMP_FILES_IN=__DELETE__ export OUTPUT_FILE=$WORKSPACE/uniprot_diff_report.json rm -f $WORKSPACE/uniprot_diff* gradle uniprotReleaseDiffTask
